source:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
The anxious Ea looks longingly skyward.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
イーアの里の心配げなイーアは、彼らの住居を見上げている。

source:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_SEQ_01<tab>The anxious Ea fears for the well-being of their friend, who has not emerged from their dwelling in quite some time, and is unresponsive when called. You agree to see if you cannot reach out to the anxious Ea's companion somehow.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストには「<var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var><var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> レベルアジャスト」が、
　設定されています。

友人が住居から出てこず、反応もないらしい。イーアの里の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB61001 /var>」にむけて交感を試みよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_SEQ_02<tab>Your skin prickles with sadness as you feel pulsating waves of misery from the Ea within. It would appear that the resident of the dwelling has been overcome with despair and means to end their own life. With a heavy heart, you decide to return to the anxious Ea to share what you have gleaned.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_SEQ_02<tab>かすかに、中にいるイーアの思念を感じた。イーアの里の「心配げなイーア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_SEQ_03<tab>While respecting their feelings, the anxious Ea is not ready to let their friend pass into the void. To that end, they ask you to procure a lump of nerve tissue from one of the enigmatic “other ones” that roam in the vicinity of the wellspring of regret. Moved by the Ea's concern, you agree to the task.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_SEQ_03<tab>アザーワンという生物の神経組織をとってきてほしいと頼まれた。オストラコン・トゥリアの逡巡の泉の付近にいる「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F228C301 /var>」を倒して「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E91B901 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_SEQ_04<tab>You successfully hunt down an other one and extract its nerve tissue. Now all that remains is to deliver it back to the anxious Ea, that they might do all in their power to save their esteemed colleague from a dire fate.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_SEQ_04<tab>頼まれていた神経組織を入手した。イーアの里の「心配げなイーア」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E91B901 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_SEQ_05<tab>Back at the Abode, the Ea is able to use the nerve tissue you provided to amplify their thoughts to a degree where they can reach their friend─and in doing so prevent said companion's passing. Rejoicing that they will be able to enjoy philosophical musings and discussions with their companion for the foreseeable future, the no-longer-anxious Ea thanks you for your help and offers you a token of thanks before you go on your way.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_SEQ_05<tab>神経組織を利用し、より強い思念を届けることで友人を目覚めさせることに成功した。本当なら友人にもモラトリアムな死を迎えてほしいものらしいが、実際には、それが叶う前に身近な無為な死を選択してしまうイーアが多いようだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_TODO_00<tab>Send out an empathetic wave toward the Ea dwelling.
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_TODO_02<tab>Defeat an other one to obtain its sinew.
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the nerve tissue to the anxious Ea.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_TODO_03<tab>心配げなイーアに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E91B901 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_000<tab>Hummm... Still no response. I wonder if they have already scattered to the wind. That would be ever so unfortunate, you see...
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_000<tab>……まだ出てこないな。
彼も、自我を放棄してしまったのだろうか。

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_001<tab>...My, what a large cranial dome you have─and impeccable timing. My esteemed colleague often holds council at their home here, but they have not emerged in quite some time. Perhaps you could pay a visit and see what the trouble may be?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_001<tab>ああ、よければ君も呼びかけてみてくれないかい？
私の友人が、住居から出てこなくなってしまったんだ。
まだ多少でも意思が残っていれば、反応があるかも……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_005<tab>They may be a bit taken aback if a stranger invades their thoughts, so I would advise transmitting a happy sentiment to show that you mean them no harm.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_005<tab>私の友人が、住居から出てこなくなってしまったんだ。
よければ、君も呼びかけてみてくれないかい？
まだ多少でも意思が残っていれば、反応があるかも……。

TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_MOANINGEA04353_000_010<tab>(-イーアのうめき声-)……あ……また……こ、え……。
そういえ……おはな、し……まだ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>The anguished groans of the Ea are resonating in your head. Tell the anxious Ea you were able to find remnants of their friend's thoughts.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>かすかに、イーアのうめき声を感じた。
「心配げなイーア」に意思の残滓を感じたと伝えよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_020<tab>I see. If they mean to melodramatically evanesce into the abyss in the comfort of their own home, then I ought to respect their wishes.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_020<tab>そう、か。
彼が望んで意思を手放そうというなら仕方ないが……
私としては、まだ友人との語らいを諦めたくはないな。

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_021<tab>And yet... I feel the need to be selfish and keep them here to confabulate further on such views. Yes, I shall have to talk them out of it!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_021<tab>君、すまないがもう少し手を貸してくれ。
私はここで、友人への呼びかけを続けるから、
その間に、ひとつある物を調達してきてくれないかい。

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_022<tab>For that, I shall need your help once more, large-headed-but-wholly-capable stranger. Could you fetch me a neurological sinew from an other one? You should find them wandering about the wellspring of regret...
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_022<tab>逡巡の泉の周辺にいる<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F228C301 /var>から、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E91B901 /var>」を取ってきてほしい。
1本あれば足りるはずだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_023<tab>You should be able to hunt down an other one in the vicinity of the wellspring of regret. Pull out one of the long, fibrous cords from its vertebrae.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_023<tab>逡巡の泉の周辺にいる<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F228C301 /var>から、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E91B901 /var>」を1本取ってきてほしい。
私はここで、友人への呼びかけを続けよう……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_040<tab>Bah! It is no use! The walls of their humble abode are far too thick for my telepathy to penetrate! Did you bring me the sinew?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_040<tab>何度も呼びかけると、
ときおり、友人の声らしき思念を感じるよ……。
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E91B901 /var>」は手に入ったかい？

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_050<tab>Perfect! This zigzagging fibrous cord is exactly what I need to amplify my empathy!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_050<tab>ああ、このウネウネ具合……良い組織だね。
それじゃあ、この組織を私自身に取り込ませてもらおう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_051<tab>These do extinguish quickly, but it should be enough for me to rile my friend with some provocative persiflage. A moment, please.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_051<tab>この神経組織を使えば、
一時的にだが、思念をより強く届けられるはず……。
さあ、さらに友人に呼びかけてみよう……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_MOANINGEA04353_000_060<tab>Uuughhh... My mind still smarts... Your worn-out jape was bad enough, but did you have to <var 1A 02 /var>shock<var 1A 01 /var> me as well?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_MOANINGEA04353_000_060<tab>ありがとう……。
全身に、一瞬ものすごい刺激がきて……目が覚めたよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_061<tab>I had entirely forgotten that, despite coming from a dumb beast, the neurological sinew from the other one would still transmit its last jolting thought─the killing blow you dealt it.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_061<tab>彼に送った思念には、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F228C301 /var>が攻撃を受けた際の、
恐怖の感情がこびりついていたんだ。
それがビリっときて、眠気が晴れたのさ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_MOANINGEA04353_000_062<tab>Yes, well, it was enough to traumatize me back onto this plane, that much is certain. Ugh... I think I shall take a stroll around the plaza to rid myself of that unpleasant sensation. Good day.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_MOANINGEA04353_000_062<tab>せっかく目を覚ますことができたし、
広場の様子を見てこようと思うよ……。
また後で、お話をしようじゃないか。

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_063<tab>My friend always was a bit melodramatic in their conduct, but I do believe I will have to keep a closer eye on them from now on. Aside from their close call with dispersion, they are showing other signs that they are losing their faculties.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_063<tab>……あの様子だと、彼も近い将来、
精神消却槽に身を投げてしまうかもしれないね。

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_064<tab>We have a friendship that spans millennia. They can stand to wait a bit longer until the void takes us all─it would be dreadfully boring without their curt, fatalistic commentary.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_064<tab>長い時を友人として過ごした彼には、
イーアとしてモラトリアムな死を迎えるまで、生きてほしい。
……そう思うのだが、これは私のエゴなのだろうね。

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_065<tab>That being said, I shall make for the plaza as well. If they somehow manage to careen towards the elutriation tank, I shall be <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> irritated.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_065<tab>さあ、私も広場へ行くとしよう。
彼が精神消却槽を見かけ、衝動に駆られないとも限らないしね。

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_066<tab>...Oh, and I do very much appreciate your assistance. I do not have much to offer, but I hope this shall suffice. Thank you for saving my friend's life.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ017_04353_EA04353_000_066<tab>君には、本当に世話になった。
大した礼もできず申し訳ないが、
おかげで、ひとまずは友人の無為な死を防げたよ。
